He was the first to translate ShakespearesShakespeare in senseablesensible and understandable German, preparing them to be published in Zurich over the years of 1762 until 1766.
Before this, not many individualindividuals in Germany know of Shakespeare due to the lack of sufficient translation.
Lessing, Goethe and Heider, all famous German poets were one of first to bring ShakespearesShakespeare's structural state among the German people, and they loved it.

After ShakespearesShakespeare's plays were played at the Birthday of Großherzogin Sophie, the people were so inspired that they founded the Shakespeare Society in Weimar in Germany, making it the centre of German literature.
